description:
I could see following race conditions during parallel instance run in /var/log/nova/nova-network.log resulting in failure of two instance startup:

2011-05-20 10:29:37,559 nova.network.manager: DEBUG [M3FMZM-SDRLWFR4BV07R abr rhelimg] setting network host (pid=6521, thread=43398704) set_network_host /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/network/mana
ger.py:162
2011-05-20 10:29:37,574 nova.utils: Running cmd (subprocess): ip link show dev vlan100 (pid=6521, thread=43398704) execute /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/utils.py:1412011-05-20 10:29:37,576 nova.network.manager: DEBUG [OYK99X8Z5YX3TMJG-REJ abr rhelimg] setting network host (pid=6521, thread=43399376) set_network_host /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/network/mana
ger.py:162
2011-05-20 10:29:37,582 nova.utils: Running cmd (subprocess): ip link show dev vlan100 (pid=6521, thread=43399376) execute /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/utils.py:1412011-05-20 10:29:37,584 nova.network.manager: DEBUG [PW1400Q8K6VVTYQX1NWO abr rhelimg] setting network host (pid=6521, thread=43399472) set_network_host /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/network/mana
ger.py:162

(nova): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/rpc.py", line 216, in _process_data

(nova): TRACE: Exit code: 3

(nova): TRACE: Stderr: 'ERROR: trying to add VLAN #100 to IF -:eth1:-  error: File exists\n'

Command: sudo vconfig add eth1 100
Exit code: 3

Stderr: 'ERROR: trying to add VLAN #100 to IF -:eth1:-  error: File exists\n' to caller

title: Need to utilize locks during vlan creation in nova-network
